text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

────Will I, be able...
to appear on shows again?
...Asahi-
The program executives were very angry with you.

────It might be difficult right away,
but...

If you keep going like this, Asahi,
I'm sure you'll be fine.
Keep going... like this...?

Yeah. I watched your lesson today...
and it was really good.

I can't help but want to see more──
So, surely another opportunity will come.
Is that so...?

Right, Asahi.
How about continuing from that time?

The performance that stopped in the middle of recording...
I really want to see it properly.
Think of my phone as a camera!

Haha,
sure thing.

Then, let's record it,
and show it to Fuyuko-chan and Mei-chan too!
Oh... That's a good idea, let's do that.

Okay, play the music...
Haha, it's getting serious.
Preparations are okay!

All right, here we go.
──3, 2...
